RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEELING was away alertly and set a pressured pace, had a slim lead on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. UNILATERAL forced the pace and dueled on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. THY KINGDOM was well back, closed the gap on the far turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was up for show. DOODLE DANDY was unhurried early and raced evenly on the far turn but was no real threat. TIMMINS settled off the pace and moved up on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch leveled off.

ENTRY.NAME: Doodle Dandy
ENTRY.OWNER: Hoad Lindsey L and Hoad Joseph B
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, evenly far turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, slim lead far turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Thy Kingdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap far turn, 6-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Timmins
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, moved up far turn, 5-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Unilateral
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, dueled far turn, 4-path stretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIAMONDBACK set the pace, took command on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch proved best. THELONIOUS stalked the early leader, raced evenly on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch held place. CRUMLIN EXPERIENCE was in range and roused on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. LOQUACIOUS was in touch and hustled along from the inside on the far turn but had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Thelonious
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, evenly far turn, 3-path stretch, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Loquacious
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along inside far turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Diamondback
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, took command far turn, 3-path stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Crumlin Experience
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused far turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 75. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the m ain track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRERET tracked the early leaders from the inside, was a factor on the turn and from the three path in mid stretch was up in time. HASN'T HIT ME YET was in range, moved up on the turn and had a bid from the six path in mid stretch but was outgunned. MY FINAL TRICK set a pressured pace and had a slim lead on the turn but was headed in mid stretch and gave way. MS. P'S BELLA settled off the pace and had a mild gain on the turn but was no real threat. CRUMLIN BIRD forced the early pace and dueled on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had nothing left. COLOR FORCE was unhurried early and saved ground on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch failed to fire. SECRET ARCHANGEL was off the pace and showed little in a dull effort. BABY MO was in touch but chased on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Color Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, saved ground turn, 5-path stretch, failed to fire

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Archangel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Hasn't Hit Me Yet
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, moved up turn, bid 6-path stretch, outgunned

ENTRY.NAME: Freret
ENTRY.OWNER: Fournier Mark Zaniol Dean Burwell Dan Langelaan Casey F Romaniuk Jason Gardiner
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, factor turn, 3-path stretch, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, chased turn, 5-path stretch, empty

ENTRY.NAME: My Final Trick
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead turn, headed mid stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. P's Bella
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, mild gain turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Crumlin Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, dueled turn, 4-path stretch, nothing left

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAKE A CHANCE was hustled early, had the lead on the turn and from the three path through the stretch was kept to task. CORE stalked the early leader and was roused from the inside on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was second best. PAPERBACK HERO was in range, had a mild gain on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was up for show. ACE DESTROYER was away alertly and a factor on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch leveled off. HALF LIT was in touch and saved ground on the turn but was not a factor. ONE PUNCH CHARLIE was off slow and showed nothing while outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Take a Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, led turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Core
ENTRY.OWNER: Warner, Nancy E. and Robert K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, roused inside turn, 4-path stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Half Lit
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, saved ground turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Ace Destroyer
ENTRY.OWNER: Radcliffe Racing Stable and Admiral Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor turn, 5-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: One Punch Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed nothing, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Paperback Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, mild gain turn, 6-path stretch, up for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOFIA'S SLUGGER forced the early pace, dueled on the turn, vied through the stretch and fought gamely for the win. BE THE CHANGE was in touch and a factor on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was outgunned for the win. BIG WARDEN set a pressured pace and had a slim lead on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. COO BIRD was unhurried early and hustled along on the turn but from the seven path at the top of the stretch needed more. WONNEFRAC was in range and raced evenly on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. EXECUTIVE SIGHT had no speed and showed little while never in contention. GLITTER MOUNTAIN was off the pace and saved ground on the turn but was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Sofia's Slugger
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, dueled turn, vied stretch, fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Big Warden
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Jeff and McGirr Jr Herbert
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead turn, 3-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Wonnefrac
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, 6-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Coo Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, hustled along turn, 7-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Glitter Mountain
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Executive Sight
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, showed little, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Be the Change
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor turn, 5-path stretch, outgunned

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 7F Turf CR: 82. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since July 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $4,725 On tario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NIKOLAOU stalked the early leader, was a factor on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch drew clear. WILBERFORCE set the pace and had a clear lead on the far turn but ducked out at the top of the stretch and was no match for the winner. BRIENNE OF TARTH settled off the pace, saved ground on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch finished evenly. RENEGADE SERENADE was off the pace, trailed the field on the far turn and passed tired foes through the stretch. JMR PURE SENSATION was in touch and hustled along on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no rally. SENSING HOLIDAY was in mid pack and roused on the far turn but had no response. MAYITO was in range but chased on the far turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch had no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Wilberforce
ENTRY.OWNER: Beharry Vinodh H and Ceccato Sharon
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead far turn, ducked out top stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Brienne of Tarth
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, saved ground far turn, 4-pah stretch, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Sensing Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, roused far turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Renegade Serenade
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, trailed far turn, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Nikolaou
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Jmr Pure Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along far turn, 5-path stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mayito
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, chased far turn, 6-path stretch, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 92. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE AUGUST 21, 2021 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAFA FOOEY was unhurried early, moved up on the turn, angled out at the top of the stretch and drew off. MOBILIZER showed speed from the inside, dueled on the turn and was second best in a good effort. JACK BEANSTALK was in range, roused on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch was up for show. SHAKOO MAKOO was hustled early and had a slim lead on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch had nothing left. PACENZA was off the pace, trailed the field on the turn and was not a factor. CRAFTY CONQUEST tracked the early leaders and raced evenly on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Fafa Fooey
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, moved up turn, angled out stretch, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Mobilizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, dueled turn, 2nd best, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Crafty Conquest
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Pacenza
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, trailed turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Shakoo Makoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, slim lead turn, 3-path stretch, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Beanstalk
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused turn, 7-path stretch, up for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 21300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed in advisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EYE GOT IT GOOD showed speed from the inside, had a slim lead on the turn and was much the best. TANGERINE TWIST was away alertly, had a good position on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch held place. MISS LINDYSUE was unhurried early, roused on the turn and was up for show. LOKI'S LIGHTNING was in range, raced evenly on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and had a mild rally. TEQUILAS MELODY was up close and a factor from between foes on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch leveled off. BABA'S GIRL was off the pace and saved ground on the turn but was no real threat. IMPOSSIBLE BERTIE was well back, closed the gap on the turn and passed tired foes through the stretch. ONLY AT MIDNITE was in mid pack but chased on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch had no rally. COSMIC SHOT was hustled early and dueled on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch faded. CRIMSON SKY had no speed, showed little and was never in contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Got It Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, slim lead turn, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Lindysue
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, roused turn, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Loki's Lightning
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, angled out stretch, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Tequilas Melody
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, factor between turn, 3-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Impossible Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap turn, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, showed little, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Baba's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Tangerine Twist
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, good position turn, 6-path stretch, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Only At Midnite
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, chased turn, 7-path stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmic Shot
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, dueled turn, 5-path stretch, faded
